task_description: 生成Q版3D卡通饺子图标，3-5个叠放，Pixar风格，白色饺皮带高光，1024x1024px商业级质量

input_data.text_prompt: 3D rendered icon of cute dumpling characters, 3-5 Chinese dumplings stacked together in playful arrangement, Pixar style 3D cartoon aesthetic, crescent moon shaped with clear pleated texture, white dough skin color (#F5F5DC) with ceramic glossy highlights, light gray shadow (#E8E8E8) in pleats, optional golden brown base (#FFD700), plump rounded Q-version proportions, smooth surface with warm luminous quality, clear visible pleated patterns, 3/4 front view angle, dual light source from top and 45-degree front, soft gradient shadows, commercial quality high-resolution rendering, pure white background, professional food icon design, appetizing presentation
input_data.negative_prompt: flat design, 2D illustration, realistic photography, dark colors, dirty appearance, broken dumplings, messy arrangement, complex background, low quality, blurry, grainy

metadata.notes: 参考input/吼巷/设计/IP/微信图片_20250923171141_52_171.png的3D卡通风格，生成Q版可爱饺子图标
